scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npx tsc && node dist/api
scripts.migration:generate: rimraf dist && npx tsc && typeorm-ts-node-commonjs -d ./src/config/data-source.ts migration:generate ./src/migrations/default
scripts.migration:run: rimraf dist && npx tsc && typeorm-ts-node-commonjs -d ./src/config/data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.migration:revert: rimraf dist && npx tsc && typeorm-ts-node-commonjs -d ./src/config/data-source.ts migration:revert
